channel.title: Need help making two commands
channel.description: I'm trying to make a jail in my game, although I have most of it planned out already, I want to make two commands to put them in jail. Here's what I mean... I will have jail levels of 1 and 2 saved on each player's character file, and I need a command like ::jaillevelup blahbah7 and another one like ::jailleveldown blahbah7 so you can change blahbah7's jail level from one to 2

item.title: Need help making two commands
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

ya, kinda like that, only, i dont want 2 have 2 go in the char file

Read full topic

no so basically like a ban, u want to do it to them and not yourself, if u wanted to just go to there charectar and change where they spawn, but i don’t know of any other way

item.title: Need help making two commands
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

none of u guys get the point…

I will be saving something in their character file kind of like player rights

I want to make a command to change that value, in game (so other admins can do it)

All I need to know is how to tell the game to change that player’s value using a command

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making two commands
item.dc:creator: @dream89 dream89
item.description:
@dream89 wrote:

one problem no cords u can do this when u put cords in. to make it so ur on a diffrent hight.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("namehere")) { teleportToX = cordhere; teleportToY = cordhere; heightLevel = 0;(if u put 1 u be higher up) updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

I think thats what u talking about? Tell me if i am wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making two commands
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

no, i wanted something like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jaillevelup”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
Jaillevel = 2
}

but wouldn’t that make my jail level 2? I want to know how to make someone else’s jail level 2…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making two commands
item.dc:creator: @dream89 dream89
item.description:
@dream89 wrote:

if u want a rights command do something like this
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commandname”) && playerRights >= 2)
then add ur tele locations. Tell me if i am wrong on what u want

Read full topic
